name: Bricks of Ruin
description:
Explore the ruins, get coins, and buy blocks to help you navigate the ruins!

Made for CPGD Veterans Day Game Jam from Thursday @ 1pm to Sunday @ ~3pm.

Made with MonoGame C# Framework

Controls:

WASD: Move

1,2,3,4: Buy or select blocks

Mouse: move block placer

Left Click: Place block

Everything by Giovanni Librizzi except the coin and player sprites, which were made by @everetta_. 

Source code available here:

https://github.com/GiovanniLibrizzi/Bricks-Of-Ruin
